reviewText: I loved being able to see this movie in such a perfect BluRay format! Such a crisp and clear picture! Watching it on my new big TV helped!!
Title: Ng Extreme

reviewText: I bought "Extreme blu-ray" to see full HD details and for the excitement of watching giant wave surfing. I am fully satisfied for both. This is a nice work, especially when you consider how hard the filming these scenes are. But the results are amazing.I agree that the main feature could have been longer. I still rate this work 5 stars.
Title: Ng Extreme

reviewerName: Gertrude, the Innocent "Live well, laugh loud...
reviewText: This looked a lot more interesting than it is.  This is an extremely short movie with very little substance to it.  It looked all right on a 52" Samsung but for some reason the picture was very small.Very glad I bought it on a Lightning Deal or I would have been that much more disappointed.
Title: Ng Extreme

reviewText: When i saw the cover i was very exited to see big wave surfing, I was very unhappy with this movie as all the shot of the surfing scene are taken from a helicopter. Its a nice introduction to big wave surfing but nothing compare to riding giants or the billabong odisey. The rock climbing was also so so. The snow board scenes are nice as always but nothing special.Overall this blu ray is good but doesnt show you anything new or that you event seen before.
Title: Ng Extreme

reviewText: I watch this at least once a month. It shows all the extreme sports and the scenery is incredible. Very happy with this purchase.
Title: Ng Extreme

reviewText: Biggest waves I've seen other than some of the tow-in surfing that Laird has done at various places across the globe. The climbing scenes are also great.  Totally enjoyed watching this and totally amazed at the size of the waves at Waimea Bay - I think 1999.  Great diversion from the pain as I'm riding my bike on the trainer in front of the TV.Buy it!  You will never regret it.  I think I've shown it at least five times during the first week I had it.
Title: Ng Extreme

reviewText: I love surfing and water sports , I grew up on the beach as a kid living in Sydney Australia . This movie was awesome from big wave surfing to windsurfing , it just blew me away . Climbing frozen waterfalls to rock climbing . I can appreciate how dangerous it is for  those men and women athletes on how they challenge mother nature and to be on top of their game because you wont get a second chance if your not.I was interested in how they filmed in Imax and to all camera men/ women and people associated with shooting documentaries, I give five stars
Title: Ng Extreme

reviewerName: Veronica L. "Your only as old as you feel! =-0)"
reviewText: Ill be watching this over and over. Definitely worth putting  into your collection. Get it! Nice  footage, and colors. =-0)
Title: Ng Extreme
